response.overview: When Ana Foxxx bumps into her high school crush Michael Vegas as she’s moving apartments, the universe sends her into a confronting time warp. As she repeats the same ten minutes of her life over and over again, she has to find the key to her escape. Groundhog Day meets Russian Doll but much, much sexier — this indie adult short film by new guest director Regan Humphrey will teach you to listen to your feelings and live your desires.
response.title: Cosmic Connections
